title: Contributing to the gsm Universe
text: Thank interest contributing gsm suite packages! repository follows centralized gsm Contributor Guidelines maintained gsm.core. Please review guidelines opening issues submitting pull requests.

title: Contributing to the gsm Universe
text: File issue opening pull request. Use appropriate issue template. Track issue gsm Roadmap Project Board. code changes made branch submitted PR following guidelines linked . detailed workflows (branching, releases, QC, CI/CD), please see full Contributor Guidelines gsm.core.

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: Tools make OpenRBQM developer’s life easier including standard GitHub actions, issue pull request templates utility functions.

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: can install latest release gsm.utils GitHub : can install development version gsm.utils GitHub :

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: package provides two main functions streamline package development:

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: Initializes new extension package standardized structure configuration: Creates package skeleton using usethis::create_package() Sets pkgdown documentation GitHub Pages Configures testthat unit testing Copies GitHub Actions workflows issue templates inst/gha_templates
code: init_gsm_package(   strPackageDir = "path/to/new/package",   lDescriptionFields = list(),   bIncludeWorkflowDir = TRUE )

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: Updates existing GSM package latest standardized templates: Refreshes .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ current issue templates (Bug, Feature, Technical Task, Documentation Task) Updates .github/workflows/ latest GitHub Actions workflow definitions Use function keep package’s CI/CD infrastructure synchronized latest conventions.

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: inst/gha_templates/workflows directory contains standardized GitHub Actions workflow templates GSM packages: R-CMD-check.yaml: Runs comprehensive R package checks PRs main across multiple platforms (macOS, Windows, Ubuntu) R versions ensure package integrity release. R-CMD-check-dev.yaml: Lightweight R package check PRs dev branch, running Ubuntu current minimum supported R versions faster CI feedback development. pkgdown--examples.yaml: Builds deploys pkgdown documentation sites automatic example indexing via add_pkgdown_examples(). Creates PR preview sites /pr/{number} deploys production sites gh-pages push main dev. pkgdown-cleanup.yaml: Automatically removes pkgdown PR preview directories gh-pages branch pull requests closed keep repository clean. r_releaser.yaml: Reusable workflow building attaching R package source tarballs GitHub releases, using A2-ai/r-releaser action configurable options data compression vignette building.

title: Utilities for gsm package developers
text: Please note gsm.utils project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

text: Scans HTML files directory (default pkgdown/assets/examples) updates standard _pkgdown.yml new sub-menu listing html files.

title: Generate Examples menu in pkgdown — add_pkgdown_examples
Generate Examples menu in pkgdown — add_pkgdown_examples
text: examples_dir Character. Path directory containing example HTML files. Default "pkgdown/assets/examples". pkgdown_yml Character. Path _pkgdown.yml file update menu. Default "_pkgdown.yml".

title: Generate Examples menu in pkgdown — add_pkgdown_examples
text: NULL invisibly.

what: Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
title: Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
text: Checks version GitHub Actions (GHA) workflows installed package version available gsm.utils. helps identify workflows need updated.

title: Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
text: strPackageDir character path package directory. Default ".". bVerbose logical whether print detailed information. Default TRUE.

title: Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
text: list following components: package_version Version found package workflows (NA) gsm_utils_version Current version available gsm.utils is_current Logical indicating package version matches gsm.utils version workflows_found Character vector workflow files found workflows_missing Character vector workflow files missing package

title: Check GitHub Actions version in a package — check_gha_version
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Check current package check_gha_version()  # Check another package check_gha_version("path/to/package") } # }

what: Create GitHub Actions Manifest This function generates a JSON manifest file summarizing the GitHub Actions workflows — create_gha_manifest
title: Create GitHub Actions Manifest This function generates a JSON manifest file summarizing the GitHub Actions workflows — create_gha_manifest
text: Create GitHub Actions Manifest function generates JSON manifest file summarizing GitHub Actions workflows

title: Create GitHub Actions Manifest This function generates a JSON manifest file summarizing the GitHub Actions workflows — create_gha_manifest
code: create_gha_manifest(   workflows_dir = "inst/gha_templates/workflows",   issue_templates_dir = "inst/gha_templates/ISSUE_TEMPLATE",   repository = "https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.utils",   description_path = "DESCRIPTION",   output_path = "inst/gha_templates/gha_version.json" )

title: Create GitHub Actions Manifest This function generates a JSON manifest file summarizing the GitHub Actions workflows — create_gha_manifest
text: workflows_dir string path directory containing GitHub Actions workflow .yaml files issue_templates_dir string path directory containing GitHub issue template .md files repository string URL GitHub repository description_path string path DESCRIPTION file output_path string path output JSON manifest file

title: gsm.utils v0.2.0
text: major update gsm.utils package. introduces: full suite CI/CD pipelines. Improved templates documentation contributors. robust utility functions setting maintaining GSM ecosystem packages. changes focus heavily package developer experience, contributor onboarding, workflow automation, ensuring package well integrated organization-wide standard building maintaining GSM suite packages.

title: gsm.utils v0.2.0
text: GitHub Actions workflows example framework building attaching R package source tarballs GitHub releases. Updated README. Initialized pkgdown website. Refactored utility functions package template management: init_gsm_package(), update_gsm_package(), add_gsm_issue_templates(), add_gsm_actions(), add_contributor_guidelines(), add_pkgdown_examples(). Added versioning system GitHub Actions templates** (#36):
